title: Joker's Updates - BB Updates (Quick View)
snippet: (TV) Vince's speech is about winning 4 HOH's and having to make 14 noms, and had to do damage control around all those noms. Vince talks about 83 days, he ate, slept, and lived Big Brother. He boasted his game as the winning combination.
